item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, June 17, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple supplier TDK claims solid-state battery breakthrough
2. Rachel Reeves to seek ‘improved’ UK-EU trade terms if Labour wins election
3. Billionaire under sanctions could get $300mn in controversial US-Congo deal
4. Benjamin Netanyahu denounces Israel military’s ‘tactical pause’ plan
5. Global defence groups hiring at fastest rate in decades amid record orders
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, June 17, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
